response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds immense value for those seeking excellence in its category. Given its quality and features, we're confident it could significantly enhance your experience or serve a valuable purpose in your life. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the commitment to providing you with the best possible solution. We're certain you'll find the investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 120}
